edu.ucla.wise.commons

Class SanityCheck

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.wise.commons.SanityCheck

  • public class SanityCheck
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to check if the inputs that application get are valid and there are attacks using these inputs

        public static boolean sanityCheck(java.lang.String value)
        Checks if the string passed contains some suspicious string patterns.
        Parameters:
        value - String to be checked.
        Returns:
        boolean true if there is pattern match else false.

      • sanityCheck

        public static boolean sanityCheck(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> valueArray)
        Checks if the array of string passed contains some suspicious string patterns.
        Parameters:
        valueArray - Array of strings which have to be checked.
        Returns:
        boolean True if there is pattern matches one of the string in the ArrayList else false.
